title: Strengthening Practical App Development Competencies: Hybrid Inquiry-Based IT Experimental Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can set experimental objectives by analyzing real-world problem scenarios.
Learners can perform data collection and analysis processes using smartphone-based tools in a limited-technology environment.
Learners can implement and evaluate information technology application cases through team-based inquiry.
Learners can identify ethical issues arising during experiments and propose solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
